answer: AI-Researcher orchestrates the complete scientific discovery lifecycle, unlike systems focusing on isolated capabilities.
The framework employs a comprehensive multi-agent architecture with structured knowledge exchange to maintain coherent reasoning.
AI-Researcher introduces Resource Analyst agents that decompose complex research concepts into atomic components, reducing hallucination risks.
The Implementation Framework uses an iterative refinement paradigm, mirroring the mentor-student relationship in academic research.
The Documentation Agent uses a hierarchical synthesis approach to transform research artifacts into publication-quality manuscripts.
evidence: We introduce AI-Researcher a novel framework that addresses these limitations by seamlessly orchestrating the complete scientific discovery lifecycleâ€”from literature analysis through implementation to scholarly documentation.

Our framework employs a comprehensive multi-agent architecture where specialized components collaborate through structured knowledge exchange to maintain coherent reasoning throughout the research process.

AI-Researcher introduces three key innovations that fundamentally advance autonomous scientific discovery. First, Resource Analyst agents decompose complex research concepts into atomic components with explicit bidirectional mappings between mathematical formulations and code implementations, dramatically reducing hallucination risks.

Second, our Implementation Framework employs a human-inspired iterative refinement paradigm where specialized agents collaborate through structured feedback cycles, mirroring the proven mentor-student relationship in academic research.

Third, our Documentation Agent overcomes LLM coherence limitations through a hierarchical synthesis approach that transforms research artifacts into publication-quality manuscripts while maintaining cross-document consistency and factual integrity throughout extensive scholarly documentation.
